mapper.select: select p_code as "pCode" , user_no as "userNo" , title as "title" , description as "description" , theme as "theme" , country as "country" , price as "price" , start_day as "startDay" , end_day as "endDay" , max_qty as "maxQty" , status as "status" , created_at as "createdAt" from tbl_product where 1 = 1 and(title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or description like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or theme like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or country like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or price like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or start_day like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or end_day like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') and theme = nvl(#{theme}, theme) and country = nvl(#{country}, country) order by p_code
